description.name: usd1bep20
description.tagline: USD1 bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-usd1 Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD1 bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/usd1 receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/usd1 wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
